info.title: GymTracker API Documentation
info.description: A RESTful API for tracking gym workouts, including exercises, training sessions, sets, and user performance statistics.

Get training frequency statistics for a user

session_count.description: Number of training sessions in the week

get.summary: Get personal best weights for each exercise

max_weight.description: Maximum weight lifted for this exercise

get.summary: Get training sessions for a specific user

Get details of a specific user
